location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 39 TO ILLUSTRATE OPERATIONS IN THE KIFRI-KIRKUK AREA, APRIL AND MAY, 1918.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 300 x 317mm, on sheet 355 x 372mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume IV, and shows a portion of western Persia and northern and eastern Iraq around Kifri and Kirkuk, indicating cities, towns, routes, railways and the Persian boundary. Form lines give some indication of relief, and rivers and lakes are printed in blue.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1927.
